definition: Mt Longmen, the northwest boundary of the Sichuan basin, an active geological fault line/Mt Longmen in Shandong/Mt Longmen in Henan

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
Longmenshan fault line, a tectonically active thrust fault line at the northwest boundary of the Sichuan basin

sentences.english: The paper also discusses the structural evolution history of the forel…
sentences.chinese: 並討論了龍門山中段中生代前陸盆地的構造演化歷史。

sentences.english: The Devonian strata are well developed in the Baishi Goujiaregionofcentral Longmen Mountains , Sichuan .
sentences.chinese: 龍門山中段白石苟家地區泥盆紀地層十分發育。

sentences.english: The eastern margin of the Tibet Plateau is composed of the Minshan Block and Longmenshan.
sentences.chinese: 青藏高原東緣由岷山斷塊和龍門山構造帶構成。

sentences.english: There is a Yi River here, and on the two sides are Fragrant Mountain and longmen Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一條伊水，河兩岸是香山和龍門山。

sentences.english: It is found that there exists a good coupling relationship between Longmen Mountain and its foreland basin.
sentences.chinese: 得出了龍門山及其前陸盆地存在良好的耦合關係。
